availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John C. Yantis (Hickman County, Kentucky, miller.)

body.p: Hickman County, Kentucky, miller. Kentucky native. Married to Martha Jane Scott Yantis in Spencer County, Kentucky, in December 1844. Father of Samuel R. Yantis, Moses B. Yantis, Stoner Yantis, and Ida Yantis. Miller in Hickman County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hickman County, Columbus, p. 470.
Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Missouri, Callaway County, Fulton, p. 572D.
Kentucky, County Marriages, 1797-1954, Genealogical Society of Salt Lake City, Salt Lake City, UT, Spencer County Marriages, Film 001877013.
"John C. Yantis (1820-1903)," Find A Grave, Memorial 26854666, accessed August 7, 2023, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/26854666.
